ratingScale.1-3: Needs Improvement: Rarely demonstrates the skill, requires significant development.
ratingScale.4-6: Adequate: Occasionally demonstrates the skill, with room for growth.
ratingScale.7-9: Proficient: Consistently demonstrates the skill at a high level.
ratingScale.10: Excellent: Mastery of the skill, performs at an elite level.

categories.name: alevin
behaviors: Attempts to shoot accurately within the penalty box.
Understands when to shoot rather than pass.

categories.name: benjamin
behaviors: Regularly takes shots on goal with improved accuracy.
Shows understanding of shot placement, not just power.

categories.name: juvenil
behaviors: Effectively finishes scoring opportunities from different angles and distances.
Uses both feet for accurate and powerful finishing.

categories.name: alevin
behaviors: Attempts to head the ball towards the goal.
Positions body properly for heading in set pieces.

categories.name: benjamin
behaviors: Heads the ball with improved accuracy and direction.
Times jumps well to connect with crosses.

categories.name: juvenil
behaviors: Executes powerful and accurate headers on goal from various situations.
Effectively uses body positioning and timing for heading opportunities.

categories.name: alevin
behaviors: Attempts volleys in controlled situations.
Displays basic control when striking the ball mid-air.

categories.name: benjamin
behaviors: Connects with volleys and maintains direction.
Positions body to control mid-air strikes effectively.

categories.name: juvenil
behaviors: Executes accurate volleys under pressure during matches.
Strikes volleys with timing and precision from various ball heights.

categories.name: alevin
behaviors: Attempts long shots from outside the box.
Basic understanding of when to shoot from distance.

categories.name: benjamin
behaviors: Shoots from distance with improving accuracy and power.
Consistently attempts shots from outside the penalty area.

categories.name: juvenil
behaviors: Takes well-placed long shots with power and accuracy.
Uses different techniques to shoot effectively from distance.

categories.name: alevin
behaviors: Attempts to shoot with power from close range.
Displays basic control over power in shots.

categories.name: benjamin
behaviors: Shoots with power while maintaining some level of accuracy.
Generates power without losing control of the shot.

categories.name: juvenil
behaviors: Consistently strikes powerful shots without sacrificing accuracy.
Generates power in shots from a variety of distances.

categories.name: alevin
behaviors: Understands basic attacking positions during set plays.
Shows awareness of open spaces in attack.

categories.name: benjamin
behaviors: Positions well to receive passes in attacking areas.
Identifies and moves into dangerous positions for attacks.

categories.name: juvenil
behaviors: Consistently positions well to exploit defensive weaknesses.
Anticipates play and moves into goal-scoring positions effectively.

categories.name: alevin
behaviors: Attempts basic crosses into the box.
Shows effort to lift the ball off the ground during crosses.

categories.name: benjamin
behaviors: Delivers crosses with improving accuracy and timing.
Crosses the ball from wide areas to teammates in the box.

categories.name: juvenil
behaviors: Consistently delivers accurate and well-timed crosses into dangerous areas.
Uses different crossing techniques depending on the game situation.

categories.name: alevin
behaviors: Performs short passes with basic control.
Passes accurately to teammates in close range.

categories.name: benjamin
behaviors: Executes short passes consistently and accurately under pressure.
Combines short passes with teammates to progress the play.

categories.name: juvenil
behaviors: Delivers accurate short passes under various levels of pressure.
Uses short passing to maintain possession and create opportunities.

categories.name: alevin
behaviors: Attempts long passes with varying accuracy.
Shows understanding of when to attempt long-range passes.

categories.name: benjamin
behaviors: Consistently delivers long passes with accuracy over distance.
Uses long passing to switch play effectively.

categories.name: juvenil
behaviors: Executes precise long-range passes that change the flow of play.
Accurately delivers long balls under pressure, both on the ground and in the air.

categories.name: alevin
behaviors: Attempts through balls with basic control.
Shows understanding of passing between defenders.

categories.name: benjamin
behaviors: Plays through balls with improving timing and accuracy.
Understands when to release a through ball to forwards.

categories.name: juvenil
behaviors: Consistently delivers well-timed and accurate through balls.
Breaks defensive lines with precise through passes.

categories.name: alevin
behaviors: Attempts to take free kicks with basic power and accuracy.
Shows understanding of aiming towards the goal from free kicks.

categories.name: benjamin
behaviors: Takes free kicks with improving placement and power.
Shows accuracy in placing free kicks towards dangerous areas.

categories.name: juvenil
behaviors: Consistently takes accurate free kicks with control and precision.
Uses different free kick techniques depending on the distance and angle.

categories.name: alevin
behaviors: Attempts to dribble past opponents with basic control.
Keeps the ball close when dribbling at slow speeds.

categories.name: benjamin
behaviors: Dribbles past defenders with improving confidence and speed.
Shows ability to change direction and beat opponents while dribbling.

categories.name: juvenil
behaviors: Effectively dribbles past multiple defenders at speed.
Maintains control while dribbling in tight spaces under pressure.

categories.name: alevin
behaviors: Controls the ball with basic technique after receiving passes.
Keeps the ball close when controlling it under pressure.

categories.name: benjamin
behaviors: Controls the ball well with the first touch under different situations.
Demonstrates ball control at speed while attacking.

categories.name: juvenil
behaviors: Consistently controls the ball with the first touch in fast-paced situations.
Shows advanced ball control under various game pressures and contexts.

categories.name: alevin
behaviors: Attempts to curve the ball while passing or shooting.
Shows understanding of bending the ball towards targets.

categories.name: benjamin
behaviors: Uses curve in passing or shooting with improving accuracy.
Consistently bends the ball around opponents during play.

categories.name: juvenil
behaviors: Accurately curves the ball to beat defenders or the goalkeeper.
Uses advanced curve techniques in passes and shots to create chances.

categories.name: alevin
behaviors: Attempts to control the ball quickly after receiving it.
Basic understanding of setting up the next move with the first touch.

categories.name: benjamin
behaviors: Controls the ball cleanly with the first touch in different scenarios.
Uses first touch to create space and avoid pressure.

categories.name: juvenil
behaviors: Consistently makes smart and accurate first touches under pressure.
Uses first touch to turn or move the ball into advantageous positions.
